Title: EU firms seek 16 billion m3 of gas through second tender for aggregated purchases
Description: Gas buyers in the European Union seek offers to meet an aggregated demand of 16 billion m3 of gas for delivery between August 2023 and March 2023 through a second tender on the AggregateEU platform, with the quantity of gas sought about a third higher than during the first tender in May.
Author: CK
